full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RIGS GSUM MGON PO'I BSTOD PA SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES RIGS GSUM MGON PO'I BSTOD PA SMON TSIG @003B DANG BCAS PA ' DI NI DBEN GNAS PHA BONG KHAR MTSAMS CAD KYI SKABS MTHUN MTSAMS ZHIG LA ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSOS THOL BYUNG DU SMRAS PA, 'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN BDE RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO,
